name: don't touch me (itch) (dreamdarkmatter)
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Contains sexual abuse, self-hatred, depression. Strongly recommended not to play if any of the following can end up harming you.

An interactive story about a girl named Lucille who doesn't want to go home. Made in 8 days in RPGMaker MZ for Narrative Game Jam 3. Recommended to interact with as many things as possible.

Play time: 10-15 minutes

UPDATE: 5/2/21 updated the game so it didn't fuck itself up after leaving the school for some people. My bad!

Tilesets used:

RPGMaker MZ Default Tiles
